subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: As if Tom Crean did not have enough to worry about with an N.C.A.A. investigation, he is wrestling with an academic problem that threatens to cost the program up to two scholarships.
snippet: As if Tom Crean did not have enough to worry about with an N.C.A.A. investigation, he is wrestling with an academic problem that threatens to cost the program up to two scholarships.
